issue.summary: haplotypic overlap of clones CR381630 and CT943666 in Zv9 causing artificial gene duplication in Ensembl
issue.description: haplotypic overlap of clones CR381630 and CT943666 in Zv9 causing artificial gene duplication in Ensembl
issue.resolution_text: The haplotypic overlap between clones CR381630 and CT943666 has been resolved by removing CR381630 from the TPF

issue.summary: There is a gap between BX908722.4 and AL954674.6 causing fragmentation of gene DMXL2
issue.status_text: 19-MAY-14: CH73-248I4 contigs have been ordered and orientated Accession for CH73-248I4: FO905036
issue.description: There is a gap between BX908722.4 and AL954674.6 causing fragmentation of gene DMXL2
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible sequencing error - causing a frameshift within zgc:162606
issue.status_text: The clone will be assessed to check for errors
issue.description: Possible SNP (single bp deletion) in CU929277 when compared with BC135029 causing a frame shift.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: ctg6282 needs flipped, causing problems with overlapping gene
issue.description: Clone CU138549 is in the wrong orientation with respect to CT025746. Overlapping gene ryr1b, (OTTDARG00000036379) therefore looks to be split on opposite strands.
issue.resolution_text: TPF has been changed, FQ311881 and CU138549 have been reversed.

issue.summary: There is a gap between CU570791 and CT943666
issue.description: There is a gap between CU570791 and CT943666
issue.resolution_text: This gap no longer exists due to relocation of clones based on optical map analysis

issue.summary: There is a gap between CT943666 and BX663503
issue.description: There is a gap between CT943666 and BX663503
issue.resolution_text: This region has changed based on new mapping information so this gap no longer exists

issue.summary: CU498833, possible clone deletion.
issue.status_text: 25-APR-14: CH1073-286F20 contigs have been ordered and orientated Accession for CH1073-286F20: FQ377889
issue.description: Possible deletion in CU498833, characterised by the first 336bp of EST AL918763 missing.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Haplotypic clone overlap
issue.description: There is a possible Haplotypic clone overlap between CU611050.13 and CU929153.6
issue.resolution_text:
Investigation of the overlap between CU611050.13 and CU929153.6 shows a small gap due to a TA repeat, and no other probles.
The overlap is 99.9871% over 15565bp
This is not a haplotypic overlap

issue.summary: Deletion in clone CR352290
issue.status_text: CR352290.10 removed from the tile path. Gene will be captured by whole genome shotgun components for GRCz10.
issue.description: It is possible that CR352290 contains a deletion. Highlighted by cDNA BC065603.1 which is missing bases 687-961. These bases are present on CABZ01002680.1 (verified using BLAST)
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: haplotypic clone overlap
issue.description: haplotypic clone overlap between the clones above, can be viewed via cDNA BC134178.1 No clone overlap in chromoview. 'False Gap(s)' entry in pgp viewer between the 2 clones.
issue.resolution_text: CT025884 has been removed from the TPF as redundant. The false gap has also been removed and replaced by a haplotypic overlap

issue.summary: haplotypic clone overlap
issue.description: haplotypic clone overlap between BX470163.8 and BX784024.10. 3 genes, are represented in both clones with cDNAs - BC047171.1, BC167474.1 and BC086968.1 Chromoview doesn't show an overlap.
issue.resolution_text: BX784024 has been removed from the reference as a redundant haplotype.

issue.summary: haplotypic clone overlap
issue.description: small, (~2kb) overlap between these 2 clones, the gap could be closed ? Chromoview not showing it though ? Confirmed by a novel gene spanning the clones - no EST/cDNA covers the region though.
issue.resolution_text: An overlap has been identified between CU469519 and CR792424, the TPF has been updated to remove the gap between these two components
